revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Jagged Pass |image = [[File:Jagged Pass.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Jagged Pass. |tokens = 22,000 |location = North of Route 112, east of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Jagged Pass''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 460,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Eric || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel || [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Diana || [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish, [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish, [[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Swablu |- | [[File:Picnicker.png|40px]] Picnicker Autumn || [[File:Shroomish.png|40px]] Shroomish |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Spoink.png|40px]] Spoink || [[File:Triathlete_(malecycling).png|40px]] Triathlete Julio || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |- | [[File:Camper.png|40px]] Camper Ethan || [[File:Zigzagoon.png|40px]] Zigzagoon, [[File:Taillow.png|40px]] Taillow |- |}
